Name: Stela of the majordomo Khenti-em-hat Meret
Description: An rectangular stela with rounded top. The curve is slightly deeper on the left than on the right. Besides the two carved udjat-eyes, there are no figurative representations in the lunette. Sixteen lines of text fill the width of the stela. There is no border around the texts but there are lines between the rows themselves. The hieroglyphs are carved.
